title: Jg Item Bug
body: me and my friend were playing a game, until my friend could but the tier 3 jungle item but he had no smite he brought it it was in his item list (or whatever its called) for about 4 seconds until it disappeared and he got no money back or the item back so he lost about 2k...

replies.body: >**DO NOT** post bug reports here. Instead, head on over to our [Report a Bug](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) board.
